title: New: Prom – Beauty Queen
body:
There can’t be too many songs written in ode to model and former cocaine addict **Kate Moss**, well, aside from the majority of **Pete Doherty’s** solo material of course.

Toronto’s **Prom** clearly share a rather bizarre fascination with the British _Beauty Queen_, penning this track for her. With Prom’s now stereotypical **Berninger**\-esque drawl and ever-so dour and self-depreciating lyrics, it’s arguably their finest track to date. Check it out below.
